items.summary: Create a new standalone page for “The CONTROL™ Framework” containing the exact sections and user-provided English copy: Hero (headline/subheadline/supporting line + CTA “Book a Founder Strategy Call”), Section 1 (Why a Framework), Section 2 (detailed CONTROL™ steps with bullets and “Outcome:” lines), Section 3 (What this means for you), Section 4 (Who this is for), Section 5 (Lead generation form positioned mid-page + strong final CTA), and a Final Section with closing line + CTA “Book a Founder Strategy Call”.
Add a “Read more” (or equivalent) link on the homepage that navigates to the new CONTROL™ Framework page.
Add a main menu navigation entry that navigates to the new CONTROL™ Framework page, while preserving existing homepage section navigation behavior for other menu items.

Implement the CONTROL™ Framework lead-generation form with the exact fields specified: First Name, Last Name, Company Name, Industry (dropdown), Annual Revenue Range (dropdown: ₹5–10 Cr / ₹10–25 Cr / ₹25–50 Cr / 50+ Cr), Biggest Operational Challenge (short text area), Work Email, Mobile Number; CTA button text “Request Blueprint Review”; and display the small text under the button: “We work with a limited number of businesses each quarter.”
On submitting the lead-generation form, capture the submission and provide a clear success state to the user without navigating away unexpectedly.
